alert.note: Alert for Big Stone; Traverse (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued March 31 at 2:53AM CDT until April 01 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CDT TODAY... ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 7 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Blizzard Warning, blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 13 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...In Minnesota, Traverse and Big Stone Counties. In South Dakota, Roberts County. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until noon CDT today. For the Blizzard Warning, from noon today to 7 AM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. In Minnesota, the latest road conditions can be obtained at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1. In South Dakota, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
